markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Velstrac](/Traits.aspx?ID=265)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 82</row>

A family of [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) from the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) that are associated with pain and agony. All velstracs possess some form of disturbing gaze.
name: Velstrac
